title: Volleyball Training Video-Olympics `84
brief_description: This video shows the different skills involved in volleyball as demonstrated by the champion players of the 1984 Olympics. Each skill is shown clearly in slow motion. An excellent training video for volleyball enthusiasts.
description: This video shows the different skills involved in volleyball as demonstrated by the champion players of the 1984 Olympics. Each skill is shown clearly in slow motion. An excellent training video for volleyball enthusiasts.
